name: Cedar Realty Trust, Inc.
description: Cedar Realty Trust, Inc. is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the ownership, operation, and development of grocery-anchored shopping centers and retail properties. Founded in 2003 and headquartered in Port Washington, New York, Cedar Realty Trust specializes in the acquisition and management of retail properties that cater to everyday needs, primarily in the Mid-Atlantic region of the United States. The company seeks to provide attractive risk-adjusted returns to its investors through a disciplined investment strategy, focusing on high-quality assets in densely populated markets. Cedar Realty Trust operates a diverse portfolio of properties that includes well-known grocery chains, discount retailers, and other essential service providers, ensuring a steady stream of rental income. With a commitment to sustainability and community engagement, Cedar Realty Trust actively seeks to enhance its properties through renovations and improvements, fostering long-term relationships with tenants and customers. The company's strategic vision includes leveraging market trends and consumer behavior to optimize its real estate holdings while maintaining a strong financial position. Cedar Realty Trust is dedicated to creating value for shareholders through prudent capital management and by capitalizing on the growing demand for retail space in key urban areas.

faq.answer: Cedar Realty Trust is headquartered in Port Washington, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Cedar Realty Trust invests primarily in grocery-anchored shopping centers and other retail properties.

faq.question: When was Cedar Realty Trust founded?
faq.answer: Cedar Realty Trust was founded in 2003.
